morningBrief.headline: Active Weather Today
morningBrief.body: 116/123 trails spinning, 62 freshly groomed. Snow Wind. 6 runs freshly groomed, mostly in Lower Mountain and Upper Mountain. Winter flexing today: snow and wind in the forecast. Dress for it.

morningBrief.headline: Storm Mode: Snow + Wind
morningBrief.body: 113 trails open, 54 groomed. Snow Wind, temperatures TBD. Storm mode engaged. Expect snow and wind, especially at higher elevations.

morningBrief.headline: Midweek Bliss
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 7" over the last week. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore.

morningBrief.headline: A Little Sugar on Top
morningBrief.body: Overnight dusting of 1" means the hardpack got a makeover. Nearly full mountain access with 64 of 64 trails spinning. Windy conditions expected. Upper lifts may have holds or delays.

morningBrief.headline: Active Weather Today
morningBrief.body: 145 trails open, 57 groomed. Snow Wind, temperatures TBD. The forecast is flirting with us: light snow expected. Not a dump, but welcome.

morningBrief.headline: Winter in Full Force
morningBrief.body: 132 trails open, 78 groomed. Snow Wind, temperatures TBD. Storm mode engaged. Expect snow and wind, especially at higher elevations.

morningBrief.headline: More Snow Coming
morningBrief.body: 85 trails open, 69 groomed. Snow, temperatures TBD. Nearly full mountain access with 85 of 85 trails spinning. The forecast is flirting with us: light snow expected. Not a dump, but welcome.

morningBrief.headline: Blustery and Snowy
morningBrief.body: 176/222 trails spinning, 92 freshly groomed. Snow Wind. Snow is in the cards for the next few days. Enough to freshen things up.

morningBrief.headline: Midweek Bliss
morningBrief.body: 108/120 trails spinning, 40 freshly groomed. 28.4 and Unknown. 108/120 trails open, 40 groomed. 28.4 and Unknown.

morningBrief.headline: Rain at Base, Snow Up Top
morningBrief.body: 166 trails open, 37 groomed. Cloud/Sun/Mixed, high of 32. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today. The elevation will make all the difference today. Rain down low, snow up high.

morningBrief.headline: Quiet Days on the Hill
morningBrief.body: 76 of 81 trails are open with 31 groomed. Unknown with a high of 24.8F. 76/81 trails open, 31 groomed. 24.8 and Unknown.
